description.value: You're an embodiment of your connection and manifest your transcendence with miraculous spells. Add two common 10th-rank spells of your tradition to your repertoire. You gain a single 10th-rank spell slot you can use to cast these spells, using mystic spellcasting. Unlike other spell slots, you don't gain more 10th-rank spells as you level up, and they can't be used for abilities that let you cast spells without expending spell slots or abilities that give you more spell slots. You can take the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Transcended Existence] mystic feat to gain a second slot.
